name: KnightKnight
description: The main purpose of this game was to have fun learning to develop a 2D Side-Scroller. I'm planning to have a final version with sound completed by the end of the month as I would like to complete 12 games this year. If you are currently playing KnightKnight, thank you for taking the time to test the game and I encourage you to leave feedback if you feel so inclined as it will help me to improve.
